attributes.action: Arrest, Imprison or Deport Religous Fanatics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call on OUR government to act with Commonsense and a duty of Responsibility to protect us in our own country, and Arrest, Imprison/Deport Anyone who creates, incites or implies any form of religous/non-religous hatred toward us citizens or our Troops returning from duty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
